    • Method Detail

      • isPassable

        public boolean isPassable(int x,
                          int y)
        Check if a tile in the (X, Y) position is passable
        Parameters:
        x - The X-coordinate
        y - The Y-coordinate
        Returns:
        True if the tile is floor, false if the tile is wall

      • getNeighbours

        public ArrayList<Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> getNeighbours(Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> position)
        Return all the passable neighbour positions of a given location
        Parameters:
        position - The (X, Y) coordinate of the location inspected
        Returns:
        All the neighbouring positions that are considered passable

      • print

        public void print()
        Draws the dungeon onto an IO device.

      • carveRoom

        public void carveRoom(Room room)
        Draws a rectangular room onto the dungeon by setting the boolean values to true.
        Parameters:
        room - The room to be carved on the map.

      • carveTunnel

        public void carveTunnel(Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> start,
                        Pair<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer> target)
        Draws a tunnel between two points in the dungeon

        The tunnel creation algorithm creates L-shaped tunnels, where it first matches the X-coordinate of the two points and then the Y-coordinate.

        Parameters:
        start - An (X, Y) coordinate of the starting location
        target - An (X, Y) coordinate of the target location
